name: Electivire
flavorText:
As its electric charge amplifies,
blue sparks begin to crackle between
its horns.

previous.name: Tangrowth
previous.flavorText:
It ensnares prey by extending
arms made of vines. Losing arms to
predators does not trouble it.

next.name: Magmortar
next.flavorText:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

pokemon.name: Elekid
pokemon.flavorText:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.flavorText:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

pokemon.name: Electivire
pokemon.flavorText:
As its electric charge amplifies,
blue sparks begin to crackle between
its horns.
